snippet: A judge said that while Pedro Gautier Espada was “somewhat under his father’s thumb,” that did not excuse his stealing federal money from a Bronx health center.
abstract: Pedro Gautier Espada, former lawmaker who was charged with his father Pedro Espada Jr in scheme to steal from Soundview Health Center in the Bronx, is sentenced to six months in prison and six months of home confinement.
lead_paragraph: A judge said that while Pedro Gautier Espada was “somewhat under his father’s thumb,” that did not excuse his stealing federal money from a Bronx health center.

headline.main: Younger Espada, Like His Father, Is Sentenced for Theft From Bronx Center
headline.print_headline: Younger Espada, Like His Father, Is Sentenced for Theft From Bronx Center
